General.Name: Guangzhou Echom Sci&Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Echom Sci.&Tech.Co.,Ltd designs, produces, and sells television (TV), white home appliance, and automobile structural parts in China. The company offers interior and exterior parts, IML/IMD Mold, and module of car; lithium battery components and portable energy storage products; medical and health equipment, such as injection molds; and magic mirror, smart whiteboard and blackboard, tablet, and multi-screen. Its products are used in home appliances, auto parts, medical and health fields, and related industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
